description:
Classic trench inspiration meets next-level weather protection. The Torrentshell City Coat provides light, durable protection and shields you from wind and wet. The packable 3-layer material keeps you dry through heavy downpours or bus-sized splashes. Features like shaped cuffs, a 2-way zipper and a hood with a fully adjustable brim are up for the challenge of intense commuting or rainy season travel.

  • 3-layer H2No® performance waterproof-breathable uses ECONYL® recycled nylon. ECONYL® is made from old fishnets, carpet fluff and pre-consumer nylon waste
  • PFC-free DWR finish sheds precipitation and the occasional coffee spill
  • Hood has an adjustable brim to help keep rain off your face
  • 2-way front zipper
  • Princess seam detailing offers a shaped silhouette
  • Partially elasticised shaped cuffs offer protection from the wind and rain, without sacrificing dexterity
  • Zippered pockets have fleece lining
  • Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
  • Regular fit
name: Patagonia Torrentshell 3L City Coat - Women's
